input: What’s the TDS rate for e-commerce sellers under GST?
output: For FY 2025-26, TDS under GST (Section 51, CGST Act) is 2% (1% CGST + 1% SGST or 2% IGST) on payments to suppliers by notified entities (e.g., government, PSUs) for contracts > ₹2.5 lakh. For e-commerce sellers, TCS (Section 52) is 0.5% (0.25% CGST + 0.25% SGST or 0.5% IGST) deducted by operators like Amazon on each transaction, effective from July 10, 2024. File GSTR-7 for TDS or claim TCS in GSTR-3B.
